message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to sell the product for $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product.
